      • computeIntersectionOnBoundary

        public org.locationtech.jts.geom.Coordinate computeIntersectionOnBoundary​(org.locationtech.jts.geom.LineSegment line,
                                                                          org.locationtech.jts.geom.LineSegment segment)
        TODO: get out of WIP, fix return text Helper method to fix some instability issues; still WIP RobustLineIntersector does not recognize a point along a segment to be on the segment...

        computes the intersection between a Ray / Half-Line and a segment, afterwards projects it onto the segment vector if sufficiently close so that the LineIntersector recognizes the intersection to be on the segment argument

        Parameters:
        line - interpreted as Line
        segment - interpreted as Segment
        Returns:
        intersection
